snippet.title: Alice In Wonderland: Nintendo DS Trailer
snippet.description: On the 5th March we will be releasing Alice in Wonderland on Nintendo Wii and DS.  Inspired by the Tim Burton movie, players enter a whimsical world of exploration where nothing is as it seems.  The Wii version follows the same style of the film, whereas the DS has a unique art design specifically designed for that platform.
